divs: Sighting DetailsI am truck driver, whom have seen many things in the night sky, from shooting stars, to satellites, to drones and helicopters. I was driving southbound on US 31 outside of ludington MI, while looking at the blinking red lights on the top of the windmills off to the east I glanced across to the west and noticed 4 very distinguished lights suspended in the sky, they seemed to make an arch shape, and i thought it was just a star pattern in the night sky, at this time i was north of the objects, i kept an eye on it and realized the further i drove the more the objects formed a striaght line as i was completely east looking west of the objects, the furthest one in the distance dissappeared over the horizon of what i could see, the other three remained visible, just a solid redish orange white colored light being emitted by these objects, they just stayed in their spot, no strobe lights, no green or red ID lights, no movement, as i made my way further south i was trained on the stationary lights, about 4 minutes into the sighting i watched as the closest one to me started to move southwest and did a quick jump and shot away leaving the other two visible lights behind and i watched them til i drove out of sight, i filed a report to the police of ludington, they had an officer investigate it but i received no notice on the investigation, the woman on the phone said there was a water holding facility up there with lights similar to what i was explaining to her, but i assured her i knew that this was NOT the holding facility, as the holding facility was 3 miles north of where i was and the objects i seen were in the sky NOT the ground
